name: affogato

pre_pr_migrator_status.pypy38: not solvable (bot CI job): main: ['linux_64_numpy1.20python3.8.____73_pypy: Encountered problems while solving: - package xtensor-python-0.26.0-py37h0379df6_0 requires python_abi 3.7 *_pypy37_pp73, but none of the providers can be installed ', 'linux_64_numpy1.20python3.9.____73_pypy: Encountered problems while solving: - package xtensor-python-0.26.0-py37h0379df6_0 requires python_abi 3.7 *_pypy37_pp73, but none of the providers can be installed ', 'osx_64_numpy1.20python3.8.____73_pypy: Encountered problems while solving: - package xtensor-python-0.26.0-py37h0122645_0 requires python_abi 3.7 *_pypy37_pp73, but none of the providers can be installed ', 'osx_64_numpy1.20python3.9.____73_pypy: Encountered problems while solving: - package xtensor-python-0.26.0-py37h0122645_0 requires python_abi 3.7 *_pypy37_pp73, but none of the providers can be installed ', 'win_64_numpy1.20python3.8.____73_pypy: Encountered problems while solving: - package xtensor-python-0.26.0-py37h5179a28_0 requires python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0, but none of the providers can be installed ', 'win_64_numpy1.20python3.9.____73_pypy: Encountered problems while solving: - package xtensor-python-0.26.0-py37h5179a28_0 requires python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0, but none of the providers can be installed ']

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.3" %}

package:
  name: affogato
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/constantinpape/affogato/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ad3bb1aca50ce9311d4e88e97e701237bce94faa6e79460f0bc2d2061f1484d2

build:
  number: 1

requirements:
  build:
    - cmake
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ninja  # [win]
    - make  # [not win]
  host:
    - python
    - numpy
    - xtensor >=0.24,<0.25
    - xtensor-python >=0.26,<0.27
    - boost-cpp
  run:
    - python
    - vigra
    - {{ pin_compatible('numpy') }}

test:
  imports:
    - affogato
  source_files:
    - src/python/test/**/*.py
  commands:
    - python -m unittest discover -s src/python/test -v  # [linux]
    # only run the absolutely necessary tests on windows and mac
    - python src/python/test/segmentation/test_mutex_watershed.py  # [win and osx]
    - python src/python/test/segmentation/test_interactive_mws_segmentation.py  # [win and osx]
    - python src/python/test/segmentation/test_grid_graph.py  # [win and osx]

about:
  home: https://github.com/constantinpape/affogato
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Affinity based segmentation algorithms.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - constantinpape
    - Steffen-Wolf
